actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the restoration of health benefits coverage in certain cases of restored survivor annuity.

summary.text: Authorizes the restoration of health benefits coverage to the surviving spouse of a Federal annuitant in those cases of restored survivor annuity following the dissolution of a remarriage where such remarriage had terminated such benefits. (Adds 5 U.S.C. 8908(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the restoration of health benefits coverage in certain cases of restored survivor annuity.
